metadata.name: Damn, Fiend Folio Reheated
metadata.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/l5nVwSN.png[/img]
[b]Fiend Folio MOD[/b] is back in town baby!
The original MOD has been fully ported, with more than double the content! Enjoy an injection of content to your game with plenty of new enemies, bosses, items, and thousands of rooms! If you enjoy challenge in your game, don't shy away! With a team that's had members work on Repentance, Revelations, Retribution, Deliverance, Community Remix, Compliance and Devil's Harvest, we hope it'll have been worth the wait!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/uGic63u.png[/img] [list] [*]An enormous overhaul to the game's floors, making them each much more distinct! [*]Over [b]500[/b] new monsters to fight! There's no friends in this basement. [*]An entire [b]23[/b] new bosses ready to kick ass! [*]Over [b]140[/b] new items, and plenty of trinkets! [*]More than [b]48,000[/b] new rooms dispersed between the floors. [*]A reworked [b]Fiend[/b]! A glass cannon pyromancer who fights with his friends. [*]The stone-faced [b]Golem[/b]! With his unique pool of [b]100+[/b] rocks, geodes and fossils. [*][b]10[/b] new challenges! Are you stronger than Golem? [*]Unlocks! You can choose to take your time or skip them and jump right in! [*]Incorporated mods: Happy Items Pack, extracts from Guwah's Greatures, Greg the Egg and more. [*]Heaps of tweaks and changes to help you feel at home! [*]Options! Open this menu with C or F1! [*]Lots and lots of rocks! [*]New pill colours! [*]At least two guns! [*]Plenty of surprises! [/list] Alongside all this we've tried our best to support other mods out there! Best played with the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2701118263]Excelsior[/url] music MOD! Be sure to check out [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2297456697]Bertran[/url]! Make sure to have [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1348031964]Custom Stage API[/url] enabled! Please let us know about any clashes or issues in our [url=https://discord.gg/xVTxhpQ]community discord[/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/Sy7FaAM.gif[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/gnjycJK.png[/img] Fiend, Budj, BlorengeRhymes, Bustin Blotch, Cadence (Ciirulean), Cake, Cometz, Connor, Creeps, Deadinfinity, Erfly, Ferrium , Fuyucchi (Maria), Guillotine-21, Gummy, Guwahavel, Happyhead, Jerb, jm2k (Julia), Jordy, minichibis, NotYourSagittarius, orisghost, Oroshibu, peas, Peribot, Pixl, pkpseudo, Poyo, RedRachis, RenRen, Sadly Just Al, Sbody2, Sin, SnakeBlock, Sunil_B, TaigaTreant, THX, TitaniumGrunt7 (Vermin), Xalum (A more detailed list is found in the ingame mod menu)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/2R7uZVi.png[/img] Join our community Discord server! [url]https://discord.gg/xVTxhpQ[/url] Follow Fiend on Twitter! [url]https://twitter.com/FiendFolioMOD[/url] Fiend Folio Official Wiki! [url]https://fiendfolio.wiki.gg/wiki/Fiend_Folio_Wiki[/url] Official awesome soundtrack! [url]https://mistajub.bandcamp.com/album/fiendfolio[/url] Maria VS Jon in Smash: Mario Mirror Match [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eFWzXVQoKnU[/url] Maria VS Jon: The Revenge Match [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8HPD_nf9E4E[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WC8kqN6.png[/img] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ahqcrjgr1k6dgu5/AAA1sSm5j-FIfTOgXOA4ljZPa?dl=0]Dropbox Mirror[/url]
